N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5.1 - Executive Order No. 1: Ordering a Freeze on Hiring. [*]
State Regulations
WHEREAS, New York State is faced with a substantial
projected budget deficit for fiscal year 1995-96; NOW THEREFORE, I, GEORGE E. PATAKI, Governor of the State
of New York, by virtue of the authority vested in me by the Constitution and

Laws of the State of New York, do hereby order an immediate hiring freeze upon
all agencies, departments, divisions, commissions, bureaus and all other
entities over which I have executive power. The Director of the Budget shall
immediately issue guidelines to implement this Executive Order. Personnel who
are necessary to protect the public health, safety and welfare or to complete
the orderly transition of government shall be exempt from this Executive Order
at the discretion of the Secretary to the Governor and the Director of the

Budget. Any other requests for exemptions from this Executive Order shall be
made pursuant to the guidelines to be issued by the Director of the Budget. The

Director of State Operations shall immediately communicate the terms of this

Executive Order to all agencies, departments, divisions, commissions, bureaus
and all other entities over which I have executive power. Signed: George E. Pataki

Dated: January 2, 1995
